mapper.insert: insert into JUMAK_USER (USER_NUMBER, USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_CELLPHONENUMBER, USER_PHONENUMBER, USER_ADDRESS, USER_ZIPCODE, USER_BIRTH, USER_GRADE_NUMBER, USER_ADDRESS_DETAIL) values (SEQ_USER.nextval,#{userId},#{userPassword},#{userName},#{userNickname},#{userEmail}, #{userCellphoneNumber},#{userPhoneNumber},#{userAddress},#{userZipcode},#{userBirth},#{userGradeNumber}, #{userAddressDetail})
mapper.select: select USER_NUMBER, USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_CELLPHONENUMBER, USER_PHONENUMBER, USER_ADDRESS, USER_ZIPCODE, USER_BIRTH, USER_GRADE_NUMBER, USER_ADDRESS_DETAIL from JUMAK_USER ORDER BY USER_NUMBER DESC
